unit.creator: Philodemus || Verhasselt, Gertjan
unit.title: History of the Eleatic and the Atomistic Schools || PHerc. 327

dsl.content:  litterae incertae cuius numerus definiri potest α̣β̣γ̣ litterae certae sed haud integrae (transcr. dipl.) vel litterae dubiae quae aliter legi possunt (transcr. litt.) ⌈αβγ⌉ litterae alterutrius vel utriusque apographi (transcr. dipl.) ⟦αβγ⟧ litterae a librario deletae (transcr. dipl.) ⸌αβγ⸍ litterae a librario additae (transcr. dipl.) ‹αβγ› litterae ab editore additae (transcr. litt.) [αβγ] litterae ab editore suppletae (transcr. litt.) αβγ litterae suppositae vel superpositae ab editore recognitae et loco suo collocatae (transcr. dipl.) α͙β͙γ͙ litterae apographi ab editore mutatae (transcr. litt.) [] litterae deperditae cuius numerus definiri potest [₍₎] una vel duae litterae deperditae [] nulla vel una littera deperdita  spatiolum | finis vel initium lineae (appar.)

P PHerc. 327 O apographum Oxoniense PHerc. 327 N apographum Neapolitanum PHerc. 327 cr. Italice ‘cornice’ pz. Italice ‘pezzo’ Amendola D. Amendola per verba Cavalieri M. C. Cavalieri, La Rassegna dei filosofi di Filodemo: scuola eleatica ed abderita (PHerc 327) e scuola pitagorica (PHerc 1508)?, «PapLup», 11, 2002, 17-53 Crönert W. Crönert, Kolotes und Menedemos, Lipsiae 1906 («Studien zur Palaeographie und Papyruskunde», 6), 127-130 Fleischer K. Fleischer per verba Lucarini C. M. Lucarini per litteras Malafronte R. Malafronte per verba Puglia E. Puglia per verba Ranocchia G. Ranocchia per verba Ranocchia 2019 G. Ranocchia, A New End-Title in the Herculaneum Papyri and the First Case of a Preserved subscriptio in One of the Books Assigned to Philodemus’ Systematic Arrangement of the Philosophers (PHerc. 327), «Mnemosyne», IV, 72, 2019, 437-458 Vassallo Ch. Vassallo, The Presocratics at Herculaneum. A Study of Early Greek Philosophy in the Epicurean Tradition. With an Appendix on Diogenes of Oinoanda’s Criticism of Presocratic Philosophy, Berlin-Boston 2021 («Studia Praesocratica», 11) VH<sup>2</sup> VIII Herculanensium voluminum quae supersunt. Collectio altera, VIII, Neapoli 1873, 197-199 * ego
